I got this back in February. The material, I don't know what it's made of but it's not what it says it is; this jacket gave me a rash. It wasn't comfortable either. The material, on the first wash, started to make little balls of "fluff" on the sleeves. There's also spelling problems, that looking back on it it's on me because they're visible on it from the photos. I thought the front said "Wonderland" - Y'all, it says "Wonderlad" not Wonderland, always check before you buy. But I would definitely not recommend this product if you want something quality. I honestly want a refund.

I got the sweater for a friend for Christmas and when it arrived I was so excited. The material of the jacket wasn’t what I was expecting but none the less it’s still good quality. The next thing I realized was the color. It is so much more vibrant in person than on the listing. For us it wasn’t an issue but it’s brighter than I thought. I will say the design on the back kind of stuck together as if the print didn’t cool all the way before getting folded. Thankfully it didn’t ruin the jacket but it could probably ruin one in the future if that’s don’t wait an extra 5 minutes before folding and shipping. Overall my friend and I really love the jacket
